item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Legalizing Sports Gambling Was a Mistake (403 points | 432 comments)

6. Hacking Kia: Remotely controlling cars with just a license plate (434 points | 274 comments)
7. Microsoft's new Outlook client moves your email to the cloud (109 points | 69 comments)

10. Vanilla OS 2: an immutable distribution to run all software (101 points | 31 comments)

13. Steve Jobs Swore the 10-Minute Rule Made Him Smarter. He Was Right (43 points | 23 comments)

20. Implementing and Detecting Anti-Debugging with Fork() (23 points | 8 comments)

24. Stem cells reverse woman’s diabetes (219 points | 29 comments)
